summary:
Latvia is a country in Northern Europe, bordering the Baltic Sea. It's one of the three Baltic states, along with Estonia and Lithuania. With a population of 1.9 million, its capital is Riga. Latvians speak Latvian and are part of the Balts ethnic group.

After centuries under foreign rule, Latvia gained independence in 1918 but later faced Soviet and Nazi occupations during World War II. It regained independence in 1991 and is now a democratic republic. Latvia is a developed country with a strong economy and is part of the European Union and NATO.
title: Latvia
